title: MAIN SUPPORT LFP ADC TO RANK UP

embed.description: Create & discover new Champion builds/strategies, check your Summoner statistics and try our powerful LoL charts.

body:
HI,

I am main support in bronze 1, and i am looking for my adc to rank up in silver to train together and have more synergy, pleasure and good results.
I am not flaming, i play to have great moments and fun.

curse or Skype available, i am french from new caledonia but speak English.

I wait you !

Son of Freljord

replies.body: Heyy C: Ima bronze 3 ADC main and am currently trying to learn all of the ADC's maybe we could duo{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
